ISSUE.TITLE: Remove .DS_Store files (and others) and add them to gitignore
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: There are some `.DS_Store` files in the repository, any non-used file shall be removed.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove the unused .DS_Store file This pr remove the .DS_Store file from the hydrus directory. Fixes https://github.com/HTTP-APIs/hydrus/issues/324
